mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE(chat_room_id, content, sender) VALUES(#{chatRoomId}, #{content}, #{sender})
mapper.select: SELECT SENDER, NICKNAME, CONTENT, CM.CREATED_DATE, CM.MODIFIED_DATE, USER_TYPE FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM LEFT JOIN USERS U ON CM.SENDER = U.ID WHERE chat_room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY CM.CREATED_DATE
